campaigns.name: Nail Polish/Nails/Piercings
campaigns.Description: I think we should be able to wear nail polish and have nails and have piercings, we, why should we suffer and have to change ourseleves to get a job and especially a job that has to do with coffee, I don't get how our nails and piercings will affect our job?
campaigns.creator: Melissa Martinez

campaigns.name: Nail Polish Allowed to be worn at work
campaigns.Description: I would like the dress code policy to be reviewed as it comes to nail polish not being allowed during working hours. I recently went on vacation and used the gel nail polish. Never did it clip off and it was extremely hard for me to remove before my return to work.
campaigns.creator: Shelby Kaiser

campaigns.name: Starbucks: Let us be pierced...Freely
campaigns.Description: Allow partners to have less restrictions on piercing quantity and placement.
campaigns.creator: Matthew Conselatore
